org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.datacenter

Class NetworkVmAllocationPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.allocationpolicies.VmAllocationPolicyAbstract
      • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.datacenter.NetworkVmAllocationPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VmAllocationPolicy

    public final class NetworkVmAllocationPolicy
extends VmAllocationPolicyAbstract
    NetworkVmAllocationPolicy is an VmAllocationPolicy that chooses, as the host for a VM, that one with less PEs in use. This policy doesn't perform optimization of VM allocation (placement) by means of VM migration.
    Since:
    CloudSim Toolkit 1.0
    Author:
    Rodrigo N. Calheiros, Anton Beloglazov, Saurabh Kumar Garg
